name: OR_LOG_ANES_CONT
description: The OR_LOG_ANES_CONT table contains OR management system log anesthesia contingencies.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log with anesthesia contingencies.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the anesthesia contingencies for this log.

columns.name: ANES_PREOP_CONT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates a pre-operative anesthesia contingency.
